title: SUNNY BRIGHT 3 BED. Close to bus & T. Close to Boston. Laundry on site
posting_body: Secured and quiet building in a quiet residential neighborhood.
Located close to Target, Costco, Wegman's, Encore Casino.
Station Landing-Pizzeria Regina, Kelly's Roast Beef
Close to Orange Line (Malden Station, Wellington, Sullivan)
Bus line to Boston and Malden is across the street.
No more waiting outside in the cold for the bus!
Wait right in the warm lobby!
Minutes in to Boston by car via RT99, Bus and Train-Orange Line
We have other 1, 2, and 3 bedroom units also available in the Everett, Malden and Chelsea areas.
For more info and to schedule a showing please call 617-721-7950.
Do not reply to this post, of you do please include your phone number.
